text: SCOTT Disick was seen looking glum as he spent time with his son Mason in LA today – following the news Kourtney Kardashian has vetoed his new girlfriend from spending time with their children. The reality star, who has Mason, Penelope and Reign with his ex, failed to raise a smile while treating Mason to some quality one on one time. X17Online. com 7 Scott Disick was seen out and about with Mason in LA today Dressed down, Scott, 34, wore a pair of cargo trousers and a black top, while Mason, 7, held onto his hand.
